name: Sudoku Quest
description: Sudoku Quest is the game for truly Sudoku lovers. Youâ€™ll be challenged to test your skills in Adventure mode with constantly increasing board difficulty. Various Sudoku types and sizes are provided to diversify your adventure experience.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7, Windows 8 (8.1), Windows 10 Processor: 2 GHz Dual Core Memory: 2 GB RAM Storage: 500 MB available space

reviews.review_text: Puzzle game about classical japanisse game - worldwide known as 'Sudoku' Game has an understandable tutorial for persons like me who has never played on it before. Every level is genereted unique and you have only 10 healthes for each. Few words about drawing - game is if painted by children's paints and looks very soft and likely May be I did something wrong, but I didn't hear any soundtrack, only game sounds

Sudoku Quest - a game for fans of Sudoku . The game has a simple graphics , because Sudoku does not require a powerful game engine . ) ) ) There are bonuses for novices to veterans also introduced a custom mode that allows you to compete with other players in the level of IQ.
I love sudoku, I enjoyed this game so much but.. its too buggy its frustrating everytime i want to beat adventure mode it just freeze and doesnt let me continue and have to start over again...
